mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.point, m.del, m.social, r.role_name FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_role mr ON m.member_id = mr.member_id LEFT JOIN role r ON mr.role_id = r.role_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, password, name, email, point, del, social) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{point}, #{del}, #{social})
INSERT INTO member_role (member_id, role_id) VALUES (#{memberId}, (SELECT role_id FROM role WHERE role_name = #{roleName}))
